name: Chop Shop (Albi)
description:
** There is a known bug where the game is frozen when you restart. this can be fixed by going to the pause menu and restarting again. SORRY FOR THIS **

This game was created in 24 hours for the GMTK 48 hour game jam (We committed the ultimate sin and changed ideas halfway through the jam)

The goal of this game is to collect salvaged vehicles and take them to the designated repair shop. Collect as many salvaged vehicles as possible before time runs out and earn your place on the leaderboards.

Controls:

WASD - Drive vehicle

E - Collect/Drop vehicle

R - Reset Vehicle

Credits

George "Albi" Robson - Programmer/Designer

Luke "Ermdad" Webber - Programmer/Designer

Upbeat Forever by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5011-upbeat-forever
